# f5distributedcloud_app_type (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_app_type` resource manages App Types in F5 Distributed Cloud.

App Types define application characteristics and enable features like API discovery, sensitive data detection, and more.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_app_type" "example" {
  name      = "my-app-type"
  namespace = "shared"

  features {
    type = "USER_IDENTIFICATION"
  }

  features {
    type = "API_DISCOVERY"
  }
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `features` (Block List) List of features to enable for the app type. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--features))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--features"></a>
### Nested Schema for `features`

Required:

- `type` (String) Feature type (e.g., USER_IDENTIFICATION, API_DISCOVERY).
